reporting package¶

Submodules¶

reporting.elasticsearch¶

class reporting.elasticsearch.ElasticSearch¶

Bases: lib.cuckoo.common.abstracts.Report

Stores report in Elasticsearch.

connect()¶

Connect to Elasticsearch. :raise CuckooReportError: if unable to connect.

do_index(obj)¶

Save results in ElasticSearch for index-task[‘id’]

load_json(json_file, name='unknown')¶

Load JSON formatted malware report. It can handle both a path to JSON file and a dictionary object.

Note

adb

Parameters

  • json_file – json path

  • name – default “unknown”

Returns

byte sequence

process_behavior(results, paginate=100)¶

Index the behavioral data.

run(results)¶

Index the Cuckoo report into ElasticSearch.

Parameters

results – analysis results dictionary.

Raises

CuckooReportError – if the connection or reporting failed.

reporting.jsondump¶

class reporting.jsondump.JsonDump¶

Bases: lib.cuckoo.common.abstracts.Report

Saves analysis results in JSON format.

erase_calls(results)¶

Temporarily removes calls from the report by replacing them with empty lists.

restore_calls(results)¶

Restores calls that were temporarily removed in the report by replacing the calls with the original values.

run(results)¶

Writes report. @param results: Cuckoo results dict. @raise CuckooReportError: if fails to write report.

reporting.moloch¶

class reporting.moloch.Moloch¶

Bases: lib.cuckoo.common.abstracts.Report

Moloch reporting module.

run(results)¶

Start report processing. ：raise NotImplementedError: this method is abstract.

reporting.mongodb¶

class reporting.mongodb.MongoDB¶

Bases: lib.cuckoo.common.abstracts.Report

Stores report in MongoDB.

SCHEMA_VERSION = '1'¶
connect()¶

Connects to Mongo database, loads options and set connectors. @raise CuckooReportError: if unable to connect.

run(results)¶

Writes report. @param results: analysis results dictionary. @raise CuckooReportError: if fails to connect or write to MongoDB.

store_file(file_obj, filename='')¶

Store a file in GridFS. @param file_obj: object to the file to store @param filename: name of the file to store @return: object id of the stored file

reporting.reporthtml¶

class reporting.reporthtml.ReportHTML¶

Bases: lib.cuckoo.common.abstracts.Report

Stores report in HTML format.

run(results)¶

Writes report. @param results: Cuckoo results dict. @raise CuckooReportError: if fails to write report.
